title: Fuchun Mountain Residenceâ€Ž
overview: Xu Jia Fu's father devoted himself to operating paper mill, and because of that, countryside where it was placed became rich. But at the same time, his family was scattered, because of the constant separation. After becoming an adult, Xu Jia Fu personally demolished his father's paper mill in order to reunite his parents and push the whole family, to back into their hometown. After becoming the secretary of Xujia Datang Village, he was determined to lead the villagers to open up a road of rural revitalization, and after experiencing the "disaster" such as the scam of the new agricultural tourism project and the pig farm disease, the confused and helpless Xu Jia Fu regained confidence under the guidance and encouragement of secretary Zheng Ben Kun.
